```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
steam <- read_csv("~/Downloads/steam-200k.csv", col_names = c("user_id", "game_name", "behavior", "hours", "_"))
```

```{r}
steam %>% 
  filter(behavior == "play") %>% 
  group_by(game_name) %>% 
  summarize(mean = mean(hours), median = median(hours), total = sum(hours), n = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(total))
```
